CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get Notified of New Ethereum Transactions
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve by receiving real-time alerts for new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How did you hear about us?
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See how our Ethereum transaction monitoring app is helping developers
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: FindETHTx has been a game-changer for our dApp development process. We can easily track new transactions in real-time, streamlining our workflow.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: FindETHTx's robust filtering and notification system ensures we never miss critical transactions. It's become an integral part of our product monitoring stack.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The intuitive UI and developer-friendly APIs make it easy to integrate FindETHTx into our existing tools and processes. Highly recommended for any Ethereum project.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our advanced Ethereum transaction tracking system. Receive instant notifications for new transactions as they occur on the blockchain.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Gain valuable insights into each transaction with our in-depth analysis. View essential details such as gas fees, sender and recipient addresses, and transaction values.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Easily navigate through a sea of transactions using our powerful filtering and search capabilities. Customize your search parameters to find exactly what you need.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Our system is built on a robust and secure infrastructure, ensuring the utmost privacy and data integrity for your Ethereum transactions.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Experience a seamless and intuitive user interface designed to simplify the process of monitoring Ethereum transactions, even for non-technical users.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Easily integrate our transaction monitoring capabilities into your existing systems and applications through our well-documented APIs and developer tools.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Transaction Monitoring App
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app monitors the Ethereum blockchain in real-time and notifies you of any new transactions as they occur. This allows you to stay up-to-date on all activity happening on the network.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We have nodes connected directly to the Ethereum network that stream transaction data to our backend systems. Our algorithms then analyze this data and push notifications of new transactions to your devices.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What kind of transactions are tracked?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We track all kinds of transactions on Ethereum - token transfers, smart contract deployments and executions, staking activity, and more. You can filter for specific transaction types that are relevant to you.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial so you can test out the app's full functionality before deciding to subscribe. No credit card is required for the trial.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about tracking new Ethereum transactions
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: This app allows you to easily find and track new transactions happening on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app connects directly to Ethereum nodes to stream incoming transaction data as it gets mined into new blocks. You can set filters to monitor transactions matching specific criteria.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What can I use it for?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Common uses include tracking payments to your wallet addresses, monitoring activity of your smart contracts, and analyzing general network activity and trends.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Do I need to run an Ethereum node?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: No, you don't need to run your own node. Our app connects to our backend infrastructure of Ethereum nodes so you can access the data easily.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, you can sign up and get 30 days of free access to try out all the features before deciding on a paid plan.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Get instant notifications for new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain as they occur.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Customize filters to only receive alerts for transactions matching specific criteria like sender, receiver, value, etc.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Easy to setup webhooks and APIs to integrate new transaction data into your existing applications and workflows.
CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the game with our cutting-edge Ethereum transaction monitoring app. Get real-time alerts for the latest transactions across the network.
